name: lore
author: Storcery
description: Convention driven framework for React + Redux applications

scripts.build: npm run build:lore-actions && npm run build:lore-core && npm run build:lore-models && npm run build:lore-reducers
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:lore-actions && npm run clean:lore-core && npm run clean:lore-models && npm run clean:lore-reducers
scripts.clean:node:group1: npm run clean:node:local && npm run clean:node:lore-actions && npm run clean:node:lore-core
scripts.clean:node:group2: npm run clean:node:lore-models && npm run clean:node:lore-reducers
scripts.clean:node: npm run clean:node:group1 && npm run clean:node:group2
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:lore-actions && npm run install:lore-core && npm run install:lore-models && npm run install:lore-reducers
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run check
scripts.test: npm run test:lore-actions && npm run test:lore-core && npm run test:lore-models && npm run test:lore-reducers
